name: PS-03-Substrate + Voronoi Abstraction
description:
v4W.ENko - "PS-03-Substrate + Voronoi Abstraction". The Black&White  representation of the standard "SUBSTRATE"  pattern realized in 2d. "Pattern`s standardisation" series is a collection of patterns realized with standard algorithmic structures of typical 2d procedural geometry.  
The white  micro-rectangles as little as almost some "dots" for our perception are moving according to "cycle wave" timeline along the lines generated with standard  "SUBSTRATE"  pattern. 
The "Voronoi" diagram is used to generate the layer of white cells according to the reparametrisation of the "Substrate" pattern. The white gray color is showing the "Voronoi" cells in real-time. 
The whole visualizations is forming abstract motion image. 
1600 cells / random seed 3888.  Packed as GIF. 1024*1024px / 180 frames.
